scripts.prestart: mkdir <%= user_data_path + '/' + sys_name + '/Database' %>; mongod --dbpath <%= user_data_path + '/' + sys_name + '/Database' %> --nojournal --smallfiles --fork --logpath /dev/null
scripts.poststop: mongo admin --eval 'db.shutdownServer()' 2>&1 >/dev/null; rm -f <%= user_data_path + '/' + sys_name + '/Database/mongod.lock' %>; exit 0
